forum.name: Reflecting on Session 2.1
forum.intro:
In Session 2.1, we focused on the impact of instructional routines on learning experiences. We also discussed mini-routines that can be part of a lesson.

In the discussion forum below, share your thoughts about instructional routines that you use regularly in your instruction. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Respond to the following:

  • What instructional routines do you use regularly in your instruction?
  • How do these routines engage students in productive struggle?
  • How do they promote making thinking visible?
  • After Session 2.1, how might you modify routines to help students have rich learning experiences that promote deep learning?
